children.text: Rich Text Editor is a powerful content editor, styled to match UI, and extensible to host any React component.
Rich Text Editor is based on Slate.JS â€” the framework to build such editors. Read more on
UUI RichTextEditor is built on top of Slate to bring UUI styles, add our extensions, panels to interact with, and to wrap them with convenient API.
